name: Engineering - Mystery of the ancient clock
name_original: Engineering - Mystery of the ancient clock
description: Play the fascinating match-3 game "Engineering: The Mystery of the Ancient Clock"! Clear up the secrets of the Ancient Chronograph. On each level you should gather the clock parts and repair the Chronograph before time runs out. Vivid graphics and sounds, and a relaxing free play mode with no time limits, will help you to relax after you beat the game's toughest challenges. Have fun!
